page.content: most popular choice.Playing on the farm had its adherents as did playing on bicycles,BMX bikes being the most sought after active activity.Other popular communual activities are ludo,darts,snakes and ladders,table tennis,chess and draughts,cards and hopscotch.Children like to go swimming but the nearest pool is at Leominster or Hereford,which means that parents must take them,a distance of twelve miles.Transport is needed for the afore mentioned activity,children tend to play together in fairly closely defined geographical areas,the village,Bromyard and the surrounding farms.Leisure activities connected with the school in their own time are the school choir,country dancing and various sports activites,enabling children to meet across the geographical barriers.
